Signal Showreel

Signal Showreel

Editing   

Editing

A showreel I edited for Signal, an award-winning video production company based in Aberdeen. Using a selection of the hundreds of videos the company worked on between 2012-2022, it is designed as a dynamic overview of the wide range of clients and industries Signal has worked with.
